name: Tanaya Guha
content: Tanaya Guha Skip to main content Skip to navigation Personal webpage: https://www.tanayag.com/ Bio: Tanaya Guha is an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science, University of Warwick. She is also a member of the Warwick Machine Learning Group. She has received her PhD from the University of British Columbia (UBC), Vancouver, Canada, and was a Postdoctoral Researcher in University of Southern California (USC). She has received several awards for research, teaching and service to the research community, and won prestigious scholarships from Mensa Canada, Google and Amazon during her doctoral studies. She is a member of IEEE Signal Processing society, ISCA, and an Executive Committee member of AAAC. Research areas: Audio analysis, Image & Video analysis, Machine Learning.
